Header: “Mile 22” scheduled to be released in August
Content: “Mile 22” is an upcoming American action thriller film directed by Peter Berg and written by Lea Carpenter and Graham Roland. The film stars Mark Wahlberg, John Malkovich, Lauren Cohan, Iko Uwais and Ronda Rousey. An elite American intelligence officer tries to secretly move a police officer with sensitive information out of a foreign country. The film is scheduled to be released on 3rd of August.
